description: Allows you to create and administer Search collections.
name: collection

path.description: Absolute path to a Lucene collection.

categories.description: Used only for creating a collection

name.description: Name for the query results returned by the list action.

collection.description: Specifies a collection name or an alias if action = "map"

language.description:
language the collection is based on: possible values are:
		english,german,russian,dutch,french,italian,norwegian,portuguese,spanish,brazilian,chinese,greek,thai,danish,japanese,norwegian,korean

engine.description: This attribute only exists for compatibility reasons to other CFML engines, the attribute is completely ignored by Railo.
